content: this is a free pattern for a st patrick s day shamrock and a 4-leaf good luck clover **check all the details and materials needed in my website here ** https //zamiguz com/crochet-shamrock-pattern/ **language ** english us **level of difficulty ** easy **terms of use | copyright ** all pictures and the pattern contained in this document are the property of zamiguz handmade creations by magna haskell aka maggie this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to copy share resell translate publish alter distribute or reproduce the pattern or parts of it in any form online or offline you may sell your handmade items made from my patterns and i would appreciate if you gave credits to zamiguz handmade creations @zamiguz when asked and when sharing your finished items no mass production allowed
